content: 1HoDLCLUB Bitcoin DIY Coin CollectionHello everyone ! i hope you all are fine !!I am happy to present you the first Bitcoin DIY coin Collection from 1HoDLCLUB.For the Fine Silver 999.9, 100 pieces were produced, they are numbered from 1 to 100! the coin is 39mm in diameter and 1oz! and for the first time there is enamel on Design! the denomination of the coin is 0.1 BTC [do not load the coin with more than the denomination.]!For the Silver plated, 210 pieces were produced, they are numbered from 1 to 210! the coin is 39mm in diameter and 1oz! and for the first time there is enamel on Design! the denomination of the coin is 0.01 BTC [do not load the coin with more than the denomination.]!Each coins is sold with 2 Hologram! DIY means it's up to you to print your private key and put it all together!important information: no hologram will be sold in addition to the 2 coins with each coin. this will be done if there are any left after the sales of the next DIY coins to come!You can choose your serial numbers! first come, first served!1HoDLCLUB Fine Silver 999.9 Bitcoin DIY CoinMintage : 100 - 29 SOLD / 71 AVAILABLE  Material : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 39mmThickness : 2.88mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 0.1BTCPrice :   [100$] per coin + shipping cost1HoDLCLUB Silver Plated Bitcoin DIY CoinMintage : 210 69 SOLD / 141 AVAILABLE  Material : Brass - Silver platedSize : 39mmThickness : 3.28mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 0.01BTCPrice :   [50$] per coin + shipping costBTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngShipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide: 1-5 coins - 16$6-25 coins - 25$Europe: 1-5 coins - 13$6-25 coins - 22$all orders will be dispatched within 48 hours!After payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Coins / ShippingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store OPEN!Twitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me
